marketplaceCompanyProductsReadonly: It look like you have read only to company products. Therefore, you will be able to access the list of all company products, but you will not be able to modify and delete products. If you think that this is a mistake, please, contact your administrator so they can modify your role ({{ roleName }}).
marketplaceOrderBySubtitle: Select the order you want products to be sorted. ASC represents sorting in ascending order, and DESC represents sorting in descending order.
marketplaceOrderSubtitle: Select the field by which the order (ASC or DESC) will be performed. The default field is the creation date of the product.
marketplaceWrongPriceRange: Wrong price range! Min price cannot be more than max price!
marketplaceUserEmail: In order to get marketplace user's email address, you need to signed in.
marketplaceUsersProducts: Take a look at user's products
marketplaceUsersNoProducts: This user has not posted any products yet
marketplaceCompanyInfoIntro: Here is the page of {{ companyName }} company public information. Starting from here, you will be able to find anything you need to know about this company including location, their website, amount of posted products and number of all employees. Feel free to click on the company location and link, to get more information.
marketplaceProductsManagementSubtitle: Here is the page where you can manage all the products that are belonging to your company.
